    Fiebach Lab

    Higher cognitive functions such as language, working memory, cognitive control, or intelligence are the result of complex processes in our brains.

    excerpt: “About Dadvar” permalink: /team/dadvar classes: wide —

    Dr. Maral Dadvar

    Scientific Coordinator
    +49-69-798-35337

    5.G095 (PEG)


    Research Interests:
    My professional experience in recent years has been mainly in science management and scientific coordination of national and international projects. My research interests as a computer scientist lie in the areas of information retrieval and sentiment analysis in online social platforms, as well as research data and knowledge management. I have extensive experience in the application of Natural Language Processing and Linked Open Data in the development of domain-specific knowledge graphs for national projects and international consortia.
